Normal.David Davis III & IV House: The David Davis III & IV House is a site on the National Register of Historic Places located in the county seat of McLean County, Illinois, Bloomington. The home was added to the register in 1982 due to its affiliation with the descendants of 19th century U.S. Supreme Court justice and Bloomington native David Davis. The house is not only listed on the National Register but it is also a contributing property to the local Davis-Jefferson Historic District.
